greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers k such that the multiplicative order of 2 modulo k is odd.
comment: Odd numbers k such that A007733(k) = A002326((k-1)/2) is odd.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: 2^3 = 1 mod 7, 3 is odd, so 7 is in the sequence.
program: (PARI) is(n)=n%2 && znorder(Mod(2,n))%2 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jun 24 2015
results.author: _David W. Wilson_
